scripts.embedded_pdf: npx resume-cli export public/index.pdf -r resume_embedded.json -t stackoverflow-fixed -d public -f pdf
scripts.common_pdf: npx resume-cli export public/index.pdf -r resume_common.json -t stackoverflow-fixed -d public -f pdf
scripts.embedded_html: npx resume-cli export public/index.pdf.html -r resume_embedded.json -t stackoverflow-fixed -d public -f html
scripts.common_html: npx resume-cli export public/index.pdf.html -r resume_common.json -t stackoverflow-fixed -d public -f html
